website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost chipping hammer with limited use cases. If you just need something for slag removal, it's a good bargain.
pros: Head has one sharp end and one flat end for versatile chipping action
Spring handle is designed to reduce impact
cons: The hammer is on the small side
some buyers thought the product would be larger

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Good Chip Hammer
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use as a handle on a smoker. It worked great for that, after I removed the hammer end. It's a little lighter than some chip hammers, but it's sturdy enough to bang away all day. So it perfect at it's price point. If you want something heavier, you'll have to look at product weights and pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbalicious

customer_reviews.title: Why are you reading these reviews?

customer_reviews.text: we have a small, wood stove in our skoolie. I use this to stoke the wood around. it works great. its not too long, not too short. works perfect! eve has a loop on the end to hang it! love this!!!!

customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a piece of metal you chip away at the slag on a weld. It seems to be holding up just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for home/hobbyist use. Great value. Appears reasonable construction for occasional use. Not sure how this will hold up if used for a professional or work use. As an occasional use tool great for cleaning slag off of your welds. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cheap hammer to leave in a covered bucket with lump charcoal to use to break apart large pieces. Nicer than expected quality, good heft and feel without being too big. I have other chipping hammers for actual welding but wouldn't hesitate to use this one for a less expensive alternative. Decent paint finish on it too which should help to keep it from rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan C

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Chipping Hammer, Great Value for Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good little chipper hammer, especially fo the price. It is well constructed and solid. Size and weight is perfect. For the price it is a must buy, if you need a hammer for welding or chipping away at rocks etc. I highly recommend this chipper.

customer_reviews.title: Good price - a bit light on the durability scale
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an Estwing but it does not need to be bullet proof at this price. I don’t plan to beat the slag into submission. Should be fine for home use.

product_meta.title: Pit Bull CHIH058 Chipping Hammer, Welding Cleasning Tool, Hand Tool
product_meta.description: Color:Original versionThis welding and chipping hammer makes it easy to clean and remove slag from all your welds. The hammer features a cone-shaped nose with a sharp, flattened point and a dual beveled tail. A helical barrel spring handle, unique to welding and chipping hammers, has a hanging hook at one end so the tool hangs easily from a peg board or nail.
feature_bullets: Helical barrel spring type handle with hanging hook at end
